website_summaries.verdict: Many people look forward to a relaxing massage after hours on their feet, and this portable unit provides a professional level shiatsu-style service. No heat option, but still a great way to recover after work.
pros: Addresses many lower leg issues, including circulation problems and fluid retention
Massage action is strong, but not painful
cons: Significant amount of pressure placed on upper calves
Does not provide a true shiatsu massage for feet
Not ideal for taller or heavier users

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: The product was nice while it lasted. 7 months of operation is low though, by any standards. Would NOT recommend anyone buying this massager!!
customer_reviews.author: Xoxo

customer_reviews.title: Great product that does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great product that does the job. You *DO* need to give your legs 5 minutes or so to get used to the kneading. I wear a 14 (US) shoes size and my feet fit in the unit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D

customer_reviews.title: May be too rough for some but I think it is awesome! If you like deep massage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my father but I think I use it more than he does! May be too rough for some but I think it is awesome! If you like deep massage, you'll like this!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife has horrible foot problems
customer_reviews.text: My wife has horrible foot problems. She uses it everyday and I don't think she would be able to walk if she didn't. Worth ever penny.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: We have really enjoyed this! At first
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed this! At first, it really hurt my calves. That was just because they needed massaging") Now, no pain, just pleasure! If you can't get a human massage, this is the next best thing. And, you have it all of the time:)
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Legs feel amazing
customer_reviews.text: The massager feels a little tight at first but then you get used to it. Its pretty big and heavy. And you probably cannot use it on the couch. You need a chair or a bed. It has 4 different massage settings and they all give different kinds of massage. I prefer the refresh setting.
customer_reviews.author: Ritesh

customer_reviews.title: The zipper/top of the massager digs into my calfs. ...
customer_reviews.text: The zipper/top of the massager digs into my calfs. The rollers, etc, push my feet out so I am constantly readjusting. It's heavy and awkard to move around. The handles might as well not be there. The packaging was TERIBLE. I fell out of the box on my way from the post office to the car...who knows how many other times it had fallen out. Not worth it in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit to see if would help my neuropathy. It is well made but has some serious drawbacks. It should have adjustments for leg size but it does not. It works well for people with small calves but it you have medium or large calves it is a pure torture chamber. My wife likes it so I will keep it but it causes so much pain for me I can't use it. It even left bruises on my calves. Great idea but they should tell you it is not designed for larger calves.
customer_reviews.author: jamesgwolfe

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a babe! I already have a Brookstone. That does the front all the way up to ankle but it becomes painful.This on the other hand is not painful and does the heels, very well and calf. IT keeps pushing the feet forward but gives you time to bring your feet back, Brookstone doesn't.It was a good buy, hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Tailor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use this for a while before giving a review. This thing is excellent. Have had since March 2017, my wife and I each have used this every night since it arrived. Much more durable than it appears. Still going strong. Provides excellent relief for PAD pain Still going strong 10/20/18
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Torture chamber for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Felt like a torture chamber. Read instructions carefully to make sure I was doing everything correctly. My feet hurt for 2 days afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have painful neuropathy and restless leg syndrome. This let's me sit and rest and takes my mind off the pain. This may hurt your feet at first. Just move them forward or back until it is comfortable. It takes a week or 2 for your feet to loosen up. I have allot of problems with my feet. They have adjusted and actually feel better. Warning though. Bigger legs will probably not for this.
customer_reviews.author: Trena Drake

customer_reviews.title: Hurts so good
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy from chemo and now tend to get leg and foot cramps. This wasn’t a cheap purchase but I was getting desperate. The first ‘squeeze’ hurts but subsequent ones feel better. I have larger calves than my husband and it doesn’t hurt him as much. I didn’t see a maximum size measurement in the description. I woke with an unexplained bruise on my calf and unsure if it was caused by this massager or not. It doesn’t have much padding and if you wear knee socks it would be even tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No rollers on the legs-just compression with air. It works ok but I was hoping for more.
customer_reviews.author: TAMU

customer_reviews.title: Tried it for my mom, glad I did.
customer_reviews.text: Mother s blood circulation and muscle ache on the lower extremities. I was skeptical because of some of the reviewers but was glad I bought it. My mom is just sitting for 15mns using the machine. She feels much better and can have a daily massage. Well, I had to try it. We re at our 50th usage already and the material is good. It is well built. You have to read instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny_desigN

customer_reviews.title: Great price and healed a old lingering ankle injury pain!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! Hubby had an old ankle injury which occasionally causes him great pain. He's been having pain again for the last few months before buying this. He was looking for some kind of massager and saw this pretty inexpensive contraption. It squeezes hard and quite a shock to experience when it first starts, but after 2 sessions the pain lessened and he even said it's fixed his ankle! He doesn't do reviews but told me I have to come on here and it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: theyre pretty average for a 220lb man like me
customer_reviews.text: I dont have huge calves ... theyre pretty average for a 220lb man like me... yet this squeezed them hard enough to bruise, so i had to return it. If i were a skinny girl i would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rosco Wild

customer_reviews.title: We love this massager
customer_reviews.text: We love this massager. I have planters fasciitis and this really does help. The different modes are welcome, at times I will cycle through 2 or 3 of them. I only wish it had a heat function but that's really a small complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin M.

customer_reviews.title: Fails within 60 days
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 41 days. Then the left side appears to have broken loose and is in-usable. Will NOT purchase this or any other Human Touch product again. 30 day manufacturers warranty with no apparent recourse
customer_reviews.author: William F. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this unit! It came very well packaged. Set up includes pulling it out of the box, taking off the packaging and plugging it in! As soon as I placed my hesitant feet in and positioned my calves I turned it on and discovered heaven on earth! It’s wonderful! May get a bit intense in the beginning for you get used to it. It has an automatic 15 minute shut off. All you do is push the button again and your back in la-la land! I strongly recommend this guy! I love it so much I may have to name it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morse-Zackery

customer_reviews.title: I Makes Annoying Noise
customer_reviews.text: I received my order in time. Almost from the beginning, it started making an annoying tapping noise. It is so annoying. I wish I have not purchased it. I don't have time to pack it again and return it. The massage is good and I wish I could have an intact one. However, what I got is a noisy defected massager. I am so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design issue with the machine
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 pieces of plastic, that continued to poke in the calf whenever I tried to use this machine. The experience of using it was painful than pleasure. I am disappointed with the design.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Came broken- couldn't replace
customer_reviews.text: I work as a wellness director and ordered 3 of these in advance of our wellness day. I made the mistake (lesson learned) of not opening each box immediately to make sure they worked. By the time I did, one out of the 3 I ordered did not work and I had missed the return deadline. I can't figure out how to contact Amazon about this issue to see if I can get a replacement. Hopefully customer service will see this and contact me.
customer_reviews.author: emily edit

customer_reviews.title: She said it feels like she is getting a professional massage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the messages for my daughter who has problems with circulation. She loves it and feels that it's helping her. She uses it every day.She said it feels like she is getting a professional massage. I highly recommend this massager for anyone who has circulation problems or if you just want a leg massage. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Good but power button is in bad location
customer_reviews.text: Good except if you just select POWER icon on the messenger, it just stops, and hum. It's not actually off to my knowledge, and I imagine drain quite a bit of power. The power button is near the cord attachment, and that'll turn off the machine. I know because when I hear the humming of the messenger when I was grabbing my drinks at night and noticed the humming sound from the messenger. Had to turn it off that method to get it to stop. Annoying as people can't come and go without reaching down to turn it off everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Y.

customer_reviews.title: This isn't the help I need
customer_reviews.text: This thing hurts. No matter how I adjusted my foot position it still squeezed to the point of me vocalizing my discomfort. It kept cracking one of my toes. I haven't had it 8 hours but it's in the box ready to be returned. And they need to quit putting the oldest ratings first on this item. If someone stops to look they'll see the more glowing reviews were all older than the complaints that are showing up now.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Very painful, tight, and too big. I am 5'5" and can't use it while sitting on my sofa. It is too high. Massage is very uncomfortable and painful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a huge hit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister for christmas. I was expecting she would think it was really weird and random. Instead it was a huge hit. It was in non stop use. My 12 year old brother wanted one. I want one. Her bf was just using it while writing law school applications. Everyone loved it. Unfortunately the price has gone up since I bought it, but I'm considering getting one for myself cause it was such a nice feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Tor

customer_reviews.title: she almost cried
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife, packaging was good and easy to setup. Unit felt little heavier than expected.We both were really excited to use it. I called my wife for demo in relax mode. It squeezed her calf so hard she almost cried. I checked manual and thought may be there is some other less powerful setting but there was not . I tried on Myself and yeah it hurt more than relaxing. So please do some more research to see if this product is what you need
customer_reviews.author: Akki

customer_reviews.title: Great but makes loud cracking/popping sounds when in use.
customer_reviews.text: It feels great - especially the “squeeze and hold” the rollers do on the auto setting. This is fantastic when I occasionally have restless legs keeping me up at night. However, if I tilt it on the stand (stand all the way forward) the unit moves and wobbles. It also makes popping and cracking sounds while in use, so you may want to wear headphones if you want full relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: Shrimp! Heaven! Now!

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product expecting it to work for more than a few months. But it sure did not. Then come to find out you can't return it unless it's within a month. That is ridicules, especially for what you payed for it. So now I own a large broken thing that takes up space and I can't do anything with. So what ever you do don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very painful on the calves
customer_reviews.text: The foot part is really nice but the part that squeezes the calf is absolutely painful! It actually hurts! There’s no way to adjust the amount of pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This device has helped my plantar fasciitis, which is why I bought it. So, I guess that counts as a success, but I wish I had purchased one that only does feet. This one has a hard ball that pushes uncomfortably into my upper calf causing pain. Ordinarily I like deep tissue massage, but this just hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: And the pressure for the feet is terrible! You practically have to stand up to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it if you have big calves! And the pressure for the feet is terrible! You practically have to stand up to get any kind of pressure for the feet which completely negates the relaxation aspect. Too big and bulky! Don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a revised Update - Great price for NOT a very good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday now that I bought it. The only complaint is I am a big man, I would like the leg slots 1/2 inch wider and 2 inches further about. That would make it much more comfortable to use. However, it would very well. The photo tells it all. I really liked this machine; 4 different massage formats and reasonably quit in use. However, yesterday 3 months old, I hear a crack and shut it down. I plastic bar inside the right boot collar broke, and the housing (plastic) cracked (see photo). The leg massage this replaced lasted almost 10 years. This one only 3 months "Buyer beware."
customer_reviews.author: M. Heinert

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide calves.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I stand on my feet all day at work. And I thought it would be great. It would be great for someone with small/normal sized calves. I have wide calves and they barely fit in the device. And when it would massage it would make weird noises. Because it was working to hard around my large calves. Recommend for small/normal sized calves.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Finkbonner

customer_reviews.title: Clicking Noise....
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure, good massage. However 3 days after Receiving and it makes this obnoxious clicking sound. Hard to relax when the machine is making clicking noises every 2 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Ag16

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this. It has handy handles on either side. I keep it in the living room so we can drag it to the couch and massage away as we watch TV or read. It really IS relaxing. My sis and her hubby were visiting the other night and tried it. They are ordering one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Good for big calves, and not for thin legs.
customer_reviews.text: I have big calves and a sore ankle. It felt weak, but I gained movement on my sore ankle so I have to say it worked. There are two shiatsu setting and two auto settings. You have to find one you like, but they seem to same. One auto holds longer than other. Con: the space is wide, so it does not seem to help my wife with thin legs or my boys, but it is OK for me.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lee

customer_reviews.title: His only complaint is that it doesn't massage his feet as hard as he would like, but if he presses his feet down in ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my bf's b-day. He loves it! His only complaint is that it doesn't massage his feet as hard as he would like, but if he presses his feet down in it then it does a good job
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great for tendinitis.
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes a little getting use to but it's been a godsend for my tendinitis. It's hard to get the correct angle though unless you sitting at the right height. I find myself constantly having to readjust my feet which is kind of tricky since this thing really goes to town on them.
customer_reviews.author: Martinex

customer_reviews.title: I'm a licensed massage therapist and I am in love with this thing
customer_reviews.text: I'm a licensed massage therapist and I am in love with this thing! It feels like a real massage! The only thing I would have to complain about is that it's not made for bigger legs. I always have to have my bare legs and feet in it. I can fit my legs in it just fine but when the massage is going on, it gets a little too deep for me. But that's just me personally. Regardless, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of foot and knee problems over the years and nothing has worked to correct the problem. I have had shots, surgery and physical therapy but I still limp when I walk and the pain is excruciating. Then I am introduced to this product by my sister. One use and I was on Amazon ordering one for myself. I have used it less than a week and already I can feel so much improvement And most of my pain is gone. It’s a lot of money to pony up if you don’t know that it’s going to work but in my opinion it is well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Angela N. Payne

customer_reviews.title: works for a certain group only
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately I have to return it because the person this was bought for do to cramping calf's and feet legs are to big and it really hurt so I tired it on my legs it is a little snug but I could work thru it because I loved it from calf to toes.
customer_reviews.author: Edythe Lyon

customer_reviews.title: ) Works better than I thought it would and now sometimes I ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was in pain, the kneading action was tough, but after a few tries, I want it harder :) Works better than I thought it would and now sometimes I fall asleep while using it as it's so relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: My friend gave this wonderful device the name Percy
customer_reviews.text: My friend gave this wonderful device the name Percy. She says it proposed to her feet. Awesome product. Great for someone that has poor circulation problems in legs and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Searcher

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Very statisfied with this product. I alternate my left and right side legs on its opposite side of the machine ( ex. left leg on right side of the machine and vice versa) after both legs get massaged on its proper left/right side of the massager. I would adjust my legs to sides of the machine making sure the massage touch part of my feet and legs of where I can get the most of it. My son took advantage with it during his week’s visit with us and was very satisfied as well. Highly recommeded
customer_reviews.author: Loyal customer

customer_reviews.title: Massages your feet and calves, but bulky and archaic.
customer_reviews.text: It does stimulate and massage the calf. But the machine clicks or pops like there was something broken, or in the wrong position inside the machine. It's a bulky machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jhos

customer_reviews.title: Ok but...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My only issue was that it came with a broken clip that i needed to repair myself. Considering it new i should not have deal with an issue like that. Otherwise its a good product
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: The massager you never knew you needed
customer_reviews.text: This massager is amazing. It works your calves and feet really good. It has multipole settings that perform different types of massage patterns. It is really relaxing and a must have for anyone that has a lot of strain on their legs. I use it almost every night. The first time I used it, my legs felt extremely sore. This was from much needed relief though, not from the machine itself. I encourage anyone to buy it. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken too soon
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this for Christmas. I loved it! I would use it several times a week. Major problem though - it is completely broken... as in, power will not come on and I’ve had it less than 4 months. When I looked to see about a warranty, there is none for loss of power. Then when I realized how much he spent on this I’m very disappointed that it is broken so quickly. I’d say it’s not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The older version was better with more settings
customer_reviews.text: The older version was better with more settings. This will do the job and it is comfortable to use. It is very hard to carry to my chair with such shallow handles. Update on my review. I have had this only a few months and it has stopped working. The older version lasted for years. I am not happy with this purchase and it was almost $300 down the drain and I no longer have the help with my swelling.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good Calf Massage
customer_reviews.text: it's a nice, strong massage and seems very solidly built. Two things are problematic: you cannot turn off the foot massage part if you only want a calf massage, and if you have a long calf, you won't fit in the machine completely, but if you do have a long calf, you probably already suspected that. Being too long for it is not a complete waste, it's just the top part of your calf will not get massaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!! Bought this for my 84 year old mom to help with her circulation. She is completely addicted to watching movies while getting a nice foot and calf massage. The cord is very short, which is the only con thus far. We had to use an extension cord to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: NikNor

customer_reviews.title: Almost right.
customer_reviews.text: I have lymphedema and this was helpful in massaging my calves but it caused the breaking down of the arch in my feet. I haven't fully recovered yet. I have still used it by carefully placing my feet so the arch isn't flattened. I can't recommend it unless changes are made so the feet aren't so crushed by it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot but the foam in the side walls got worn in pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Welty

customer_reviews.title: Best one you can ever have.dont think,go for it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect massager and probably the best in the market,recieved on the time thanks to seller and amazon prime,its working perfectly so far in my first day.It has 4 different way to massage which is pretty fun,love it.5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: tenzing c.

customer_reviews.title: Good for STRONG massages only
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use - but to a fault. HumanTouch is a great brand for these, but this model is so basic that it affects the comfort of the massage. There are 2 strong massage settings and 2 shiatsu settings and that’s it - there is nothing for intensity in the model. We returned it and got the SOL model from the same brand because it offers multiple lower intensity settings. If you’re only looking to use STRONG massage settings, this will do the trick though. Seller was great with everything and both products arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. I’m just upset it doesn’t also heat the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Brother J

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a worthless machine which does nothing to make you feel better. It is irritating and the programming is really bad. All the modes do more or less similar thing. I tried it several times in the hope that it will make me feel better. Literally, after I hiked for 15 miles, I tried it and it did nothing to provide any pain relief. It doesn't relax your feet at all. A simple rubber massage ball gave way better relief than this machine. Given the price tag, I really hoped it will work!
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Singh

customer_reviews.title: ... my tired feet doesn't message your feet at all garbage product would like to return it for some other ...
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this product might work for my tired feet doesn't message your feet at all garbage product would like to return it for some other product that does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Darkopr

customer_reviews.title: Too big and doesn’t massage feet well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this massager on a day when my feet were really killing me. I have flat feet and they are often swollen and very sore by the end of the day. I was really looking forward to receiving the massager. When it arrived, I was surprised by just how big and heavy it was. Plus, while the massager clamped around my calves and massaged them pretty well, I didn’t feel like it did a good job of massaging my feet which was my main complaint. Sadly, I decided to return it. I’ll look for a smaller massager that focuses more on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Worth what I paid and then some
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager. I used it at a friends house many years ago and waited until the price drop so that I could buy one myself. So happy that I finally own one. I have fallen arches and my feet ache so bad sometimes. I use the machine once every few days and it has helped tremendously. The feet pain is just about all the way gone which has improved my mood as well. Plus I'm able to walk longer distances like I did when I was younger.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing Leg / Foot Massager
customer_reviews.text: The Human Touch Targeted Leg Massager was an addition we bought to accompany our massage chair. It is easy to use and operate. When first using it, the tight compression on our calves was almost uncomfortable. We kept using it only to realize the more we used it, the more comfortable it was. We had never thought about the fact that the muscles in our calves were so tight and stressed. In addition, the foot massager relaxes muscles often over looked. We like the ability to tilt the angle of the massager. We would buy this item again and recommend it to other customers.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not as relaxing as I hoped compared to my other one
customer_reviews.text: I have another Calf Massager by Zeny at my other home and bought this one for my vacation house. Although I got the other one as a gift, this one actually cost ten bucks more and isn't better. When I compare the two, this one doesn't squeeze nearly as hard at the other does so it doesn't provide as much relief as it could. Some reviews stated the option to wear socks which kind of works but defeats the purpose of a massager that is supposed to squeeze the calf. Also, there is no option to turn off the feet portion and only massage the calf part as my other one does.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Use it every night as I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use it every night as I am on my feet a lot. No more leg cramps during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foot massager
customer_reviews.text: 1st day using this product and it is Strong gotta get use to it but it maybe worth the money I hope it last long... I’ll keep you all posted but I really do like like strong it feels it is fairly large tho
customer_reviews.author: LoveWins

customer_reviews.title: This is not like New!!! Amazon's description is wrong!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the used like new product. I had ordered from this category of products before from Amazon without issue but this item had pet hair all over it and multiple sratches on the body. It had obviously been used for a length of time and by no means was it like new. Would like to return but the product is pretty big and I waited while for it so I may just wash out the fabric (the footrest part is removable) and keep. Amazon really needs to do better with product descriptions!!
customer_reviews.author: Simpleminds

customer_reviews.title: Shipped a broken product
customer_reviews.text: This would've been a 5/5 easily, because the massaging is seriously amazing. However, turning it on and immediately a LOUD clicking noise happened every 2 seconds. On the inside of the machine a plastic piece was broken and snaps against the motors pieces every time they make a rotation. If they turned the machine on for literally 2 seconds they would've noticed this problem, or maybe they did and didn't care. I can feel exactly what part has broken/come lose comparing it to the other side, but it's underneath the lining so I am not even able to fix it myself. Seriously disappointing, don't risk $200 on this it's not worth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real Massage
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. A real massage. Once each day or two and my calf-feet circulation is much improved. Feet greatly less full of stress. Not perfect... doesn't get every little place in feet and a little light in calf massage... but for an automatic... "massage for free anytime"... its a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2017... it's a beast!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as a Christmas gift in 2017. His calves hurt from a lot of walking, and I have ZERO regrets! He has it under his desk and will literally spend the evening working and getting his feet and legs massaged. He's 6'1" and the space is more than ample for his legs. He loves it. My sister is ordering one for her husband this year. VERY loved by my husband, I can't say enough. When he travels, he's so happy to see it when he gets home... then he says hello to me :) LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elevate yourself to legendary...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wifes birthday, and now I am the greatest husband that's ever walked the planet Earth. So buy this for your special someone, and imagine what you can become.
customer_reviews.author: ZoZo

customer_reviews.title: Great massage, a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.text: The massage you get from this is very nice. It is rather tight on the calves, but once the muscles get worked out it feels nice. The cord could be a bit longer as it must be plugged in right next to where you are using it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It is too bulky and can't replace the real massage
customer_reviews.text: It is too bulky and can't replace the real massage. I love writing good reviews and hate writing bad one. But need to be honest. And please, it is my personal opinion. It was bulky, and does massage to the upper parts of the leg. I thought it could do something for the feet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: Unbearable pressure on legs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great waste of money. The pressure that is applied to your legs is unbearable and not adjustable. DO NOT waste your money like I did. I missed my return date and now stuck with this hunk of machinery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hubby. He uses this every day after work and before bed. He lays the thing on the bed on it's back and stuffs his feet inside while laying down. Always seems to be a prelude to a nap😁
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Feels good but going to return.
customer_reviews.text: My parents recommanded this foot massager. Feels good little bit small for me who is 6.1ft but perfect size for others who is short than me. However I think I got defective item. It makes clicking noise.
customer_reviews.author: aneoaosj

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Felt like it was going to fold my ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Felt like it was going to fold my feet in half, maybe if you're into that this will be good, but too strong for me
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but can be a little rough on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but can be a little rough on the back of the calf. My wife and I wasn't sure what to think initially, but we find ourselves using it everytime we sit on the couch. It's big though. There's not really anywhere you can easily store this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah J Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing -
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I received this item a week ago and have enjoyed it immensely. The controls are easy to use and the different massages work great. We each have a favorite setting. So far so good no problems. I did like a more expensive massager better, but for the savings I am pleased with this one. Check back in a couple of months to see if we are still as pleased.
customer_reviews.author: K Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great Foot Messager, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foot messager, I thought it had heat but don't really need it as my feet were starting to get warm just being inside it. Some say it crushes your legs but the pressure is just right. I wish the foot rollers were not so hard but I can deal with it. I got this via "open box" so I saved about 50 bucks off the normal price. Absolutely nothing wrong with it. Overall I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Badge

customer_reviews.title: It wears out over time.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I first got it. It worked my lower leg and heels great. I used it every day two to three times a day. The padding has worn out. I only feel it working my heels and feet lately. I purchased an air compression massager.
customer_reviews.author: Tod R Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why people gave negative reviews on this product because it’s awesome. I could probably fall asleep using this because it’s so relaxing! I didn’t find the pressure too tight as some stated, but that’s personal preference. I had 2 blood clots in my lower leg during my pregnancy 2 years ago and I’ve had occasional soreness still from hyper irritated nerves. I’d recommend this product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kinser

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: I prefer harder pressure, and where it does target, it does pretty well. Basically it will rhythmically squeeze your calves, roll your arches and squeeze the sides of your feet. The different settings are basically the exact same thing, just with altered timing. If this sounds like what you want, you probably wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Well, like other reviews stated, I started hearing a click when starting it up. This makes it very difficult to get the relaxing quiet time and peace of mind. My feet kept sliding forward, so I had to keep trying to slide them back into place. It was a very unpleasant experience that I did not enjoy. I sent it back to Amazon for a refund to purchase a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Auto Insurance

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth every penny.  I want to send one to Mom...and Dad...and brother...to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered to the wrong address...luckily they were kind enough to bring the large box our way. Amazon and UPS foul up there. Otherwise, incredible. I teach fitness classes, run, and spend loads of time on my feet, so this is perfect. It’s set up in the den where I normally relax and I have yet to turn it off. Deep calf massage and you can wiggle your feet around to get at different areas and joints. It gets warm and the fabric is so soft and smooth. It’s a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi2211

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great massager. Pinches my calves though- and they're not that huge!
customer_reviews.author: Djturnitup

customer_reviews.title: I really like it too
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a month now. I bought it as a present for my wife (and to give my hands a rest!), she LOVES it. I really like it too. I can see where some may have some pain, but I really like it. Plus i notice if i move my calf just a bit forward it takes some pressure off. If it was any weaker I would probably be disappointed in it as a massager. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. Have aching feet and legs from work all day. It really helps with the cramping of the feet and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Starlette Marie Topa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great, just plain great. It seems a little ruff at first, but actually my feet and calves feel wonderful at the end of the massage
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile settings
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife, as she has neoropathy. I use it as much as she does. Well worth the money. It's bound to have at least one setting you will enjoy. I think this unit has four, and I find three very satisfying. I use it when my RLS flairs up, and after 10 minutes, it's gone. It has an adjustable position bar under the front foot, which allows a tilt towards the rear to suit different chairs. My wife and I enjoy using this and were very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TCNitro58

customer_reviews.title: Relief for my pharmacist husband
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who stands on his feet at work for many hours a day. He was complaining of pain in his feet and especially in his calfs. Working as a pharmacist he never gets even a lunch break and spends as much as 14 hours at a time standing.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina FreedTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: do not massage any area that is swollen, inflamed or has skin eruptions
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we opened past the 30 day return policy and the booklet states above headline. .... so we never tried it and now don't know what to do with it. My husband has psoriasis so is afraid to use it. Don't know how to return or trade it in.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome massager
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gifts I've ever gotten my husband. He spends over 12 hrs a day 6 days a week on his feet. This machine he uses twice a day before and after work. He no longer gets leg cramps while sleeping his feet doesn't hurt,his circulation in his feet is way better and his feet aren't always freezing anymore. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for mother!
customer_reviews.text: She has some leg issues related to blood flow, etc. in her legs. She loved this machine. It moves blood up your legs instead of down like some and was perfect for her. Highly satisfied. I also got my wife the 5.1 whole body massage chair from Human Touch and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. My calf's are always sore and it is hard for wife to dig deep enough but the leg massager is perfect for that. At first it may seem a little tight but after a relaxing it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey R. Day

customer_reviews.title: It feels great and improves pain and circulation in my tired feet ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to slip my feet into at the end of a long day of teaching! My only wish is that the massaging functions were more "random" but, it's a machine, not a human. It feels great and improves pain and circulation in my tired feet and calves.
customer_reviews.author: Michaele Rea

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this massager
customer_reviews.text: Likes. Good massage. It has a few different modes that I like cycling through. Dislikes. Only issue is that it can be hard to get enough intensity. Would depend on your calf thickness and might be able to adjust with different clothing. This gets used nonstop at our house. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Can be painful
customer_reviews.text: Bruised the back of my wife's leg on first use. I tried it and it squeezes the hell out of the top of the back of your legs. Have to adjust your legs so that they are not in the top of the unit or it is painful. Once adjusted, it works pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Adam VandeBrake

customer_reviews.title: I have rheumatoid arthritis and my worst joints are my ankles
customer_reviews.text: I have rheumatoid arthritis and my worst joints are my ankles. After about a week of using this massager, all the swelling in my ankles dissipated. It was amazing and continues to be. I have had this a little over 2 months and I use it every single day (multiple times!). My rheumatologist is amazed as is my husband. I have actual shapely ankles now and no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

product_meta.title: Human Touch Reflex4 Targeted Relief Foot & Calf Shiatsu Massager
product_meta.description:
Style:Reflex4

The evolutionary next step in foot-and-calf massage excellence is here. The new silver and black two-tonedHuman Touch “Reflex-4” Foot and Calf Shiatsu Massager is the easiest, most effective way to rejuvenate and revitalize tired muscles and joints to put that spring back in your step. Enjoy a soothing life-like foot–and-calf massage with Human Touch patented Figure-Eight Technology, healing and soothing your feet every day.

Reflex-4 features include:

 * Patented Figure-Eight Technology. Massages the calves in an upward, rolling or wave-like motion, circulating blood from the feet toward the core of the body, allowing fresh nutrients to re-enter the calves and feet for greater healing and soothing comfort
 * Under-Foot Reflexology Massage Rollers. Powerful rollers under the feet provide a robust reflexology massage to the sole and heel
 * 4 Auto-Massage Wellness Programs:Shiatsu 1, Shiatsu 2, Relax, and Refresh
 * CirQlation Technology. CirQlation is a technology developed by Human Touch that incorporates proprietary mechanics to drive its robotic actuators. The Reflex-2 delivers a remarkably life-like massage that emulates the expert hands and techniques of highly trained massage therapists. Only Human Touch offers this patented technology
 * Removable and washable sleeve inserts
 * Extended height for maximized massage coverage
 * Built-in handles for easy portability
 * Adjustable Tilt: For perfect angle alignment
 * Ergonomic Styling. Enhanced tilt angle perfectly matches the body’s ergonomics for maximum comfort. The sleek, modern and compact unit has been stylishly redesigned to provide superior and effective relief at home or work

The Reflex-4 offers improved circulation, quick recovery for over-stressed feet, and rejuvenated muscles after long periods of standing, all in one convenient massage tool that you can use at home or work. This product greatly benefits those with:

 * Sore Feet, Ankles, and Heels
 * Fibromyalgia
 * Plantar Fasciitis
 * Circulatory Issues, especially those with diabetes and varicose veins
 * Stress
 * In need of pain and post-surgery relief

Since 1979, Human Touch wellness solutions provide measurable physical and psychological benefits to a wide range of users including back pain patients, active seniors, sports enthusiasts, and those living with chronic pain. Influenced by our esteemed Wellness Council members, our wellness solutions alleviate stress and muscle pain, while increasing circulation, boosting immune systems, and promoting the body’s natural healing processes.

Human Touch products are backed by limited warranties against defects in materials and workmanship. For product tips, warranty questions, and all other inquiries, please contact Human Touch's Customer Experience directly at (800) 355-2762 or e-mail us at: csadmin@humantouch.com.

Product Intensity: This product's massage is moderately intensefor a deep tissue experience

Calf Massage Dimension: From bottom of feet, massager rolls up to 13"

Bottom Foot Reflexology Roller Dimension: Rollers reach to Men's shoe size 14

OUR MISSION

Human Touch provides innovative products and experiences that deliver life changing benefits.

“Figure-Eight Technology pampers tired, tender, and sore muscles. This foot-and-calf massager will enhance your life with improved circulation to the legs, relaxed essential postural muscles, and reduced pain and discomfort. Begin your day with this technology to energize and rejuvenate, and then end the day with a soothing, relaxing massage.“ –Dr. Jon L. Stucky, Doctor of Chiropractic. Human Touch Wellness Council Member
feature_bullets: PATENTED FIGURE-8 TECHNOLOGY. Completely surrounds the feet and calves to deliver a fluid, highly effect massage that emulates the expert hands and techniques of highly trained massage therapists
STIMULATING UNDER-FOOT REFLEXOLOGY ROLLERS. Powerful rollers just under the feet provide a robust massage to relieve soles and heels
Calf Massage Width - 4.5 inch. Calf Massage Height - 12 inch. Operating Voltage : AC110-120V 60 Hz. Power Consumption : 52 Watts
Non-Skid Floor Protectors. Floor protectors keep unit in place and ensure quiet operation.

ERGONOMIC STYLING. Enhanced tilt angle perfectly matches the body's ergonomics for maximum comfort. The sleek, modern, and compact unit has been stylishly designed to provide superior and effective relief at home or work.
Easy-Carry Handle. Reflexology massage brings the body back into its natural equilibrium which promotes the body's natural healing power and promotes healing.
Refer to the Application guide that explains "What to Expect From a CirQlation Massager"

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
